definition: (sentence-final particle expressing exhortation)/(syllable filler in a song)
mouth/classifier for things with mouths (people, domestic animals, cannons, wells etc)/classifier for bites or mouthfuls
to make an appointment/to invite/approximately/pact/treaty/to economize/to restrict/to reduce (a fraction)/concise
to weigh in a balance or on a scale
interjection of surprise or pain/Oh/Ow/My goodness!

sentences.english: Sometimes stick-on nails are the only way to go.
sentences.chinese: 有時候粘貼上去的假指甲也有同樣的效果喲。

sentences.english: If you shed tears when you missed the sun, you also miss the stars.
sentences.chinese: 如果你錯過太陽時流了淚，那麼你也喲錯過羣星了。

sentences.english: In summer, the ice-lolly peddler hawking.
sentences.chinese: 夏天裏喲，那個賣冰棒的叫賣聲。

sentences.english: Both friendship and material benefits may well come to you at this time.
sentences.chinese: 友誼和物質利益可能會同時不請自來喲。

sentences.english: A decapod crustacean has ten limbs.
sentences.chinese: 十足蟲甲殼類動物喲十隻足肢。

sentences.english: Goodspeed, you want to watch? There's something wonderful inside.
sentences.chinese: 朱宏，你想不想看？裏邊很精彩的喲。

sentences.english: So that’s more than 7000 people that could be saved by a rat.
sentences.chinese: 所以老鼠可以挽救7000多條人命喲。

sentences.english: A girl named Na Hanyo in the orchard.
sentences.chinese: 果園的姑娘哦阿娜爾罕喲。

sentences.english: I remember thinking, "Yea, this guy gets it."
sentences.chinese: 我記得當時想，“喲，這個傢伙有兩下子。

sentences.english: Gee, honey, do you really need all that stuff for a 3-day holiday?
sentences.chinese: 喲，親愛的，就度3天假，你真需要那麼多東西呀？

sentences.english: Do you have a TV in the bedroom?
sentences.chinese: 在你們臥室裏喲電視機嗎？

sentences.english: Welcome to the Mayan jungles, a magical place teeming with secrets and traps.
sentences.chinese: 歡迎馬雅叢林中，一個神奇的地方喲祕密和陷阱。

sentences.english: Damn Homie, in highschool you was tha man, homie.
sentences.chinese: 喲，哥們，高中的時候你也算個風雲人物呀。

sentences.english: it may not seem like much, but it is our first thanksgiving together.
sentences.chinese: 也許看起來不太像，但這可是次共度感恩節喲。

definition: final particle expressing exhortation, admiration etc
(final particle equivalent to 了[le5])/(particle calling attention to, or mildly warning of, a situation)
(interj. of admiration or of disgust)/to click one's tongue/to attempt to (find an opportunity to) speak
sentence-final particle (abbr. for 呢啊[ne5 a5] or variant of 哪[na5])
modal particle indicating indicating lack of enthusiasm/modal particle indicating that things should only or can only be done a certain way
to chant/see 梵唄|梵呗[fan4 bai4]
original poster (in an online forum)/landlord of a building (traditional)
to thank/to apologize/to wither (of flowers, leaves etc)/to decline
phonetic a, similar to 呵/-azine, see 吖嗪[a1 qin2]
It is said that ... (at the start of a narrative)/to discuss/to recount
to do sth more quickly/Hurry up!/Get a move on!
